organizations.name: United Nations
quotes: a UN Tech Envoy could identify over-the-horizon concerns that need improved cooperation or governance;

coordinating the digital technology-related efforts of UN entities; improving communication and collaboration among technology experts within the UN; and advising the UN Secretary-General on new technology issues.
The High-Level Panel on Digital Cooperation convened by the UN Secretary-General will advance proposals to strengthen cooperation

organizations.name: High-Level Panel on Digital Cooperation
quotes: The High-Level Panel on Digital Cooperation convened by the UN Secretary-General will advance proposals to strengthen cooperation

roles.title: UN Tech Envoy
quotes: if appointed, a UN Tech Envoy could identify over-the-horizon concerns that need improved cooperation or governance;

provide light-touch coordination of multi-stakeholder actors to address shared concerns; reinforce principles and norms developed in forums with relevant mandates; and work with UN member states, civil society and businesses to support compliance with agreed norms.

quotes: advising the UN Secretary-General on new technology issues.
